name: Glitter (itch)
description:
Ludum Dare 42 Game Jam Prototype Project

It's unfinished and there's a lot more to the game to be done. It's more about the mood and atmosphere of the game then content or gameplay so there isn't a whole lot that's there, feel free to explore the map.

W, A, S, D or arrow keys for Movement. Space to Jump

Click (LMB) to Attack, Press E to interact.

Press Esc or Backspace to Exit.
